title: [Extension Proposal] Apache Mina SSHD extension and Bouncycastle support extension

labels.name: area/quarkiverse
labels.description: This issue/PR is part of the Quarkiverse organization

body:
### Description

Hello, this is a proposal to make Apache Mina SSHD https://mina.apache.org/sshd-project/ a Quarkus extension.

Probably getting inspiration from https://github.com/apache/camel-quarkus/tree/main/extensions/ssh

The extension would also required BouncyCattle support, we would need to get inspiration from https://github.com/apache/camel-quarkus/tree/main/extensions-support/bouncycastle/runtime/src/main/java/org/apache/camel/quarkus/support/bouncycastle

A draft extension had been created here: https://github.com/jkubeio/kport/tree/main/quarkus-sshd

### Repository name

quarkus-sshd

### Short description

Provide basic support of Apache Mina SSHD in Quarkus.

### Repository Homepage URL

https://quarkiverse.github.io/quarkiverse-docs/sshd

### Repository Topics

- quarkus-extension
- apache sshd
- apache mina sshd
- bouncycastle


### Team Members

- @sunix


### Additional context

_No response_
